metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13640 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In qBittorrent before 4.1.7, the function Application::runExternalProgram() located in app/application.cpp allows command injection via shell metacharacters in the torrent name parameter or current tracker parameter, as demonstrated by remote command execution via a crafted name within an RSS feed.

criterions.comment: qbittorrent package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
